name: Stock Balance Summary
query:
WITH
stock_ledger_entry AS (
	SELECT
		item_code,
		IFNULL(production_year, "") AS production_year,
		SUM(actual_qty) AS actual_qty
	FROM
		`tabStock Ledger Entry`
	WHERE
		is_cancelled = 0
	AND
		posting_date <= %(to_date)s
	GROUP BY
		item_code,
		IFNULL(production_year, "")
	HAVING
		SUM(actual_qty) > 0
),
sales_order_item AS (
	SELECT
		item_code,
		production_year,
		SUM(qty_to_deliver) AS qty_to_deliver
	FROM
		(
		SELECT
			sales_order.name AS sales_order,
			sales_order_item.item_code,
			IFNULL(sales_order_item.production_year, "") AS production_year,
			IF(SUM(sales_order_item.qty - sales_order_item.delivered_qty) > 0, SUM(sales_order_item.qty - sales_order_item.delivered_qty), 0) AS qty_to_deliver
		FROM
			`tabSales Order Item` sales_order_item
		INNER JOIN
			`tabSales Order` sales_order
		ON
			sales_order_item.parent = sales_order.name
		WHERE
			sales_order.docstatus = 1
		AND
			sales_order_item.docstatus = 1
		AND
			sales_order.status NOT IN ('Completed', 'Closed')
		AND
			sales_order_item.qty - sales_order_item.delivered_qty > 0
		AND
			sales_order.transaction_date <= %(to_date)s
		GROUP BY
			sales_order.name,
			sales_order_item.item_code,
			IFNULL(sales_order_item.production_year, "")
		) sales_order_item
	GROUP BY
		item_code,
		production_year
)
SELECT
	stock_ledger_entry.item_code,
	item.item_name,
	stock_ledger_entry.production_year,
	item.brand,
	stock_ledger_entry.actual_qty,
	IFNULL(sales_order_item.qty_to_deliver, 0) AS qty_to_deliver,
	stock_ledger_entry.actual_qty - IFNULL(sales_order_item.qty_to_deliver, 0) AS available_qty
FROM
	stock_ledger_entry
INNER JOIN
	`tabItem` item
ON
	stock_ledger_entry.item_code = item.name
LEFT JOIN
    `tabTire Size` tire_size
ON
    item.tire_size = tire_size.name
LEFT JOIN
	sales_order_item
ON
	stock_ledger_entry.item_code = sales_order_item.item_code
AND
    stock_ledger_entry.production_year = sales_order_item.production_year
AND
	item.is_stock_item = 1
AND
	stock_ledger_entry.actual_qty > 0
AND
	(CASE
		WHEN %(filter_based_on)s = 'Actual Balances' THEN stock_ledger_entry.actual_qty > 0
        WHEN %(filter_based_on)s = 'Available Balances' THEN stock_ledger_entry.actual_qty - IFNULL(sales_order_item.qty_to_deliver, 0) > 0
	ELSE
		FALSE
	END)
ORDER BY
    item.brand,
    tire_size.sorting_code,
    item.ply_rating
